meanings.definition: Not autonomous; lacking independence or self-governing capabilities.
meanings.sent1: The robot was nonautonomous, needing constant commands to function.
meanings.sent2: The nonautonomous vehicle required a driver to navigate.
meanings.sent3: The nonautonomous toaster refused to pop up the toast until told to do so.
meanings.sent4: Her nonautonomous behavior resembled a puppet controlled by invisible strings.
meanings.sent5: The nonautonomous plant relied on human care to survive.
